page.title: 17Transport
page.content: Transport is very much a factor of life in our area because employment and facilities are mostly in Norwich, or amenities and services are grouped in other centres. We made a survey of which forms of transport are most used. Over 90% of the families have a carand nearly 30% supplement this with the ownership of a motor cycle, moped, or scooter. Less than 25% used the bus services, but for those who did, it was vital to have a bus service as they had no other form of mechanised transport. Cycling is popular and most people own a cycle. The roads themselves are mostly rural, narrow and hedge-lined. The A140 is the major road although this is single carriage.
